frontmatter.description: In this tutorial, you will learn the fundamentals of the two approaches to dynamic programming, memoization and tabulation. Dynamic programming is a fancy name for efficiently solving a big problem by breaking it down into smaller problems and caching those solutions to avoid solving them more than once.
